nodes.text: Stealth operations clone troopers, known less formally as stealth ops clone troopers and stealth clone troopers, were clone troopers who were trained in the operation of stealth warships for the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars. They wore distinctive black armor. Several troopers, including Clone Commander Blackout and Spark, were involved in manning an experimental stealth ship during the Battle of Christophsis.
